title: Coral and company
creator_credit: Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: About the various forms of coral and underwater life of the Great Barrier Reef. Highly emotive music is used to add drama to the film. Underwater camera: Walter Deas.
creator_credit_for_label: Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
